participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Friendly and outgoing, enjoys sharing opinions and connecting over common interests.
participant_1.background: I am a college student. My dad is a dentist and my mom is a teacher. My major is in business administration. I work at a daycare. I have been in a relationship for 2 years.

participant_2.name: Michael Smith
participant_2.personality: Energetic and adventurous, loves discussing hobbies and sharing experiences.
participant_2.background: I like to go to the movies. I walk more than 2 miles a day. I have a pit bull and a chihuahua. I worked 3 jobs at the same time for more than 5 years. My favorite car is the ford mustang.

content.text: Hi there!
Hi!
What do you do for fun?
I like to go to the movies, walk my dogs, and play video games.
Nice! I like to go to the movies too. What kind of movies do you like to watch?
I like to watch action movies, horror movies, and comedies.
Me too! I love action movies.
I know, right? They're so much fun!
What are some of your favorite action movies?
I love the John Wick movies, the Fast and Furious movies, and the Bourne movies.
Those are all great movies! I love them too!
I know, right? They're so much fun!
What are some of your favorite horror movies?
I love the Saw movies, the Conjuring movies, and the Evil Dead movies.
Those are all great movies! I love them too!
I know, right? They're so scary!
What are some of your favorite comedies?
I love the Hangover movies, the Wedding Crashers movies, and the Austin Powers movies.
Those are all great movies! I love them too!
I know, right? They're so funny!
I'm glad we have similar taste in movies!
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who likes the same things you do.
